short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add any world clock of your choice to remain updated with the time in different locations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚è∞ A productivity booster World Clock browser extension!

üèÜ Featured by Google on Chrome Web Store (since following all technical best practices, latest platform APIs, and meeting a high standard of intuitive user experience & design, among other things).

üí™ Features:
- All settings are kept in sync
- Add, Remove, SORT, and Edit time zones
- Convert time zone time to other time zones
- Very easy to use
- Responsive layout
- Nice add/remove effect for better user experience
- Select the color theme from the available presets
- Set your color for the individual clock
- Set font color and size as per your choice
- Select 12 or 24-hour format
- Turn on/off seconds display
- Change the display name after adding the clock
- Different sets of layouts added
- Keep the settings panel on the left or right
- Reset all settings
--- New features are added regularly üë®‚Äçüíª
